Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities

Activities of the application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Activity_Information_Detailed Details about the application and the authors
Activity_Setup This is the activity where settings can be modified.
Activity_Splash_Register Shown before the start of the actual application to prompt user to register.
FActivity_TabHost Tabs are hosted in this FragmentActivity. (1=Main, 2=List, 3=New, 4=Filters, 5=Setup)
Fragment_Filters This fragment contains the fiterling options for the issues
Fragment_Issue_Details Show issue details.
Fragment_List Show a list containing all issues (Filtered)
Fragment_Main Main Fragment that contains a map showing all issues
Fragment_NewIssueA A form for writing issue title, description, category, attaching photo, and proceed to localization of the issue (Fragment_NewIssueB)
Fragment_NewIssueB Second fragment for submitting an issue: selecting the location of the issue and submit to remote server
Fragment_SoloMap Fragment showing a single issue on the map
 

Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities Description

Activities of the application. They are "windows" where information is visualized.
